title: Generative Drawings
subtitle: Generative art, patterns creation using programming languages such as Javascript and Processing

paragraphs: Generative art refers to art that in whole or in part has been created with the use of an autonomous system. Using Javascript and Processing I created these pieces to illustrate the creative capability of algorithmically determined artwork. blends design, programing, and my own visual expression into works that are unique but follow certain patterns. As the artist, I write rules that can generate infinite outcomes. I found generative art to be fascinating as the artists are not creating an end result but a live system that is interactive and creates unlimited unique designs with different parameters set.
